titles: A pleasant conceyted comedie of George a Greene, the pinner of VVakefield As it was sundry times acted by the seruants of the right Honourable the Earle of Sussex.
author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592, attributed name.
publisher: By Simon Stafford, for Cuthbert Burby: and are to be sold at his shop neere the Royall Exchange,
notes: Running title reads: The pleasant comedie of the pinner of Wakefield.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
